entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 early this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
